text:
@davidaxelrod @POTUS A scientific study that shows how a 1 week delay causes 5 more COVID-19 cases 1 month later irrefutably proves this fact⤵️

Even if #Trump continues to do everything right from now on in fighting “C-19”, given HIS DELAY after he was first briefed, many many more PEOPLE WILL DIE‼️ https://t.co/O2ZBsS9S1N
